column1: Follow my congressional Twitter account @RepCarbajal to stay informed about all of the work happening in Washington DC and throughout the District.
.@PPActionCA Thank you for your continued support! https://t.co/RNhRIWZm7f

We will protect our planet from climate change and create good-paying jobs in the renewable energy sector while we’re at it.  For too long the Trump Administration has stood in the way of progress. Today voters said enough is enough. Let’s get to work.

I look forward to working with the Biden Administration to renew the promise of America. Together we will take decisive action to crush COVID-19 and make overdue investments in our infrastructure. We will protect and expand the ACA and lower the cost of prescription drugs. 3/

We sorely need steady and compassionate leadership and today American voters delivered by electing Joe Biden. Throughout his campaign President-elect Biden focused on the hard work we all must do to  restore trust in our Democracy and to bring us together as Americans. 2/

Congrats to @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris for this hard-fought victory! Votes are still being counted but it has become clear that voters both across the country and on the Central Coast recognize that we are better than the divisive politics of Donald Trump. 1/

I look forward to spending the next term working to deliver another COVID-19 relief package expand access to affordable and high quality health care protect our environment create economic opportunities and so much more. Let's get to work! https://t.co/5wr0EsiA5n
Track your ballot here 👉🏽  https://t.co/YbOdmxuf7B

👏🏽A big thank you to everyone who got out to vote!👏🏽  Based on the current vote count and the vote trend districtwide I'm projected to win re-election!!   But all votes must still be counted.   Thank you for your support and for using your voice to make our community better!

🚨 California has same-day voter registration! 🚨  If you haven't registered to vote it's not too late! Find out where to go:   SLO County: https://t.co/3H0XFNgGT2  SB County: https://t.co/Fq4IOpQn0x  Ventura County: https://t.co/7tAT7M6h3s https://t.co/u8r25xmyMr

Today is the day #CA24! Vote your values and find your polling place & closest ballot drop box https://t.co/cbojXHNn17   🗳  Polls are open 7am - 8pm  🗳  Drop boxes close at 8pm 🗳  ALL mail-in ballots must be post-marked today! https://t.co/RiTfvodtK2

I'm really proud of the organizations that have supported me. They represent the diversity of our communities: folks who protect good jobs fight for the middle class mitigate the effects of climate change keep our communities safe & work toward a bright & inclusive future. https://t.co/Tw42kX83eF

Early voting continues today in #ca24!!  We are at record turnout but it's going to take ALL of us to elect the candidates who will fight to move us forward.  Find early voting and drop box locations:  https://t.co/6nO8k3vMIR **Mail-in ballots MUST be postmarked by tomorrow**
🇺🇸 IT'S GOTV WEEKEND! Help us connect with folks who have not yet voted. 🇺🇸  SB County: https://t.co/FUslmaikq9 SLO County: https://t.co/S8gvo0K05R https://t.co/FaITGfpEjI
Early in-person voting starts today! Many polling locations have changed - find early voting sites here: https://t.co/6nO8k3vMIR https://t.co/R0B7DQCkf4

I'm thrilled to receive the endorsement of @eqca. LGBTQ+ rights are human rights. I won't stop fighting to protect our shared mission of a world that is healthy just and fully equal for all LGBTQ+ people. #Vote4Equality https://t.co/AfK9xIitbM

🚨We need your help contacting voters now through when the polls close. Turnout is key to electing Democrats up and down the ticket. Sign up for your GOTV shift! 🚨  SLO County: https://t.co/S8gvo11Bur  SB County: https://t.co/FUslmazVOJ
6 days   #VOTE https://t.co/USnJ7ZB9YO
My wife and I were finally able to return home and VOTE!   So much is at stake. Gather your friends and family make a plan and make your voice heard. #VOTE #VoteEarly https://t.co/zSdGqV1ONZ
39% of voters in the District have already returned their ballots. What's your voting plan? #VoteEarly #vote #MakeAPlanToVote https://t.co/WttXXZefoH

I could not be more honored to receive the endorsement of the #IAFF. I remain committed to doing all I can to make sure these heroes have the resources they need to do their jobs be it COVID-19 or unprecedented natural disasters. #UnionStrong https://t.co/A8mDEdUPPD
Proud to have the endorsement of @NewtownAction https://t.co/7iyVoG25Bg

#MyNameIs Salud which means health in Spanish. I'm proud of my name & of my parents who brought me here when I was five. They worked hard to put food on the table & as a farmworker my father worked hard to put food on YOUR table. #IWillVote Joe & Kamala bc they value diversity https://t.co/K0J1f6cHEL
I'm proud to announce that I've been endorsed by the @SLOTribune It has been my great honor to serve the Central Coast and I'll never stop fighting on your behalf. https://t.co/WArCWLBUIQ

As Sen Rs ram through a SCOTUS nom who wants to overturn Roe v. Wade and dismantle the ACA - imperiling the healthcare of millions of Americans during a global pandemic - it's more important than ever to stand up for reproductive freedom. We can't go back! https://t.co/cWgzLUPoWg

We need health care champions in Congress like Rep. Carbajal who are willing to fight for our freedom dignity and access to reproductive care.  --Planned Parenthood Action Fund president @alexismcgill 2/ https://t.co/3gHkAe7YGB

I'm honored to be endorsed by @PPact & @PPCCAF   "Planned Parenthood Action Fund is proud to endorse Rep. Salud Carbajal for re-election. Reproductive freedom is once again on the ballot. Now more than ever issues of basic autonomy and access to health care are under threat." 1/ https://t.co/rK3eKlnOFj

I'm honored to receive the @sbindynews endorsement! I've worked hard for the Central Coast since getting elected to Congress and in my years as a County Supervisor. The Central Coast is my home and I'll never stop fighting for the values that will move us all forward together. https://t.co/C0kgrnuVEg

Some SB voters will get their ballots as early today. Don't delay in returning your ballot.   For those not relying on the USPS ballot drop off-locations and in-person sites can be found here: https://t.co/cbojXHvLCx https://t.co/95kzm2IRiQ

Those numbers are pretty good but it still means a lot of people aren't participating in something that's fundamental to our democracy.   Encourage your friends and family to make sure they're registered https://t.co/cbojXHvLCx and then make sure they have a plan.   2/2

Happy National Voter Registration Day!   Fun Facts! According to the Secretary of State  Only: 🗳 87.6% of eligible voters in Ventura County 🗳 86% of eligible voters in SLO County &  🗳 78% of eligible voters in SB County are registered to vote   1/2
Such devastating news. In losing Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg we've lost a pillar of justice and fairness. This is an enormous loss for our country and for the judiciary. https://t.co/jJlDXhmP6U

Growing up I never wanted to get an F on anything.   Today I could not be prouder of the F I got from the NRA for the work I do on gun safety.   I stand with all of the candidates and every American fighting to make our communities safer from gun violence.   #ProudOfMyF https://t.co/QdInvuOSGw

Labor Day isn't just a day to celebrate but a day to honor the sheer will & determination of workers in this country. It is the sacrifice of every union member that gave us the middle class the weekend set hours and pay child labor laws and safe labor practices. Thank you! https://t.co/zwJPcX4EFI

It looked a little differently this year but I'm always grateful to be part of @Cen_Coast_Labor Labor Day event in Santa Maria honoring our union brothers and sisters.   Working families are the backbone of the U.S. economy and union jobs mean a strong middle class. #LaborDay https://t.co/coK9RY3Ayw

The climate crisis is one of the most critical issues facing us today. Yet in the 2016 presidential debates there wasn't a single question on climate change.   Join me in asking @Debates to make climate change a focus of the 2020 debates. https://t.co/4AQ4AfdpOI

Today is a good day to register to vote check your registration or make a voting plan. We can find the courage to stand up for what we know is right and help heal the injustices in our nation. https://t.co/cbojXHvLCx

Recognizing #WomensEqualityDay means honoring those who fought to get the 19th Amendment passed and every person who works to ensure those rights are protected. Let's all do our part and vote! https://t.co/R1XiWq7A38

I'm so honored to earn this endorsement. The impacts of the #ClimateCrisis are severe and they are upon us. It is our responsibility to be good stewards of the environment and fight to protect the scenic views and beautiful open spaces that make the Central Coast so unique. https://t.co/r8PxI7LAYq

.@JoeBiden has the heart grit and values we need in a President. He's bringing Americans together instead of driving us apart and together we can make our country whole again.   I'm more excited than ever to elect #BidenHarris! Let's get to work. https://t.co/chjecnSuwG

I have always admired @KamalaHarris's integrity character and dedication to serving our country.   She has always fought for the middle class & working families and has always been a strong advocate for the people in my district.   I know she'll be a great VP. #BidenHarris https://t.co/7SCyhBsASo

Thank you @GabbyGiffords. It’s moving and motivating to see one compassionate resilient leader stand with another.  I'm proud to be endorsed by @GiffordsCourage & am all in with with you and @JoeBiden. #DemConvention https://t.co/qYwTpCfBLV

Last night we heard from inspirational leaders & Americans from every corner of our country. Tonight we're in for another night of excitement.  I'm ready to hear from @BarackObama @TeamPelosi & future Vice President @KamalaHarris.   Who are you excited for? #DemConvention https://t.co/rUANhZohkr
Roll call! Proud to be a delegate from California's 24th District.   Let's nominate @JoeBiden for President of he United States! https://t.co/3Icqp7PKbO

We got off to a great start on day 1 of the #DemConvention!   Are you tuning in for Day 2? We'll hear from @DrBiden @TraceeEllisRoss and the many Americans uniting across the country to nominate Joe Biden.   Tell me: what are you most looking forward to tonight? 👇
💪🏽💪🏽💪🏽💪🏽 https://t.co/gxBh1upscu

The #19thAmendment centennial anniversary is an incredible occasion. But many suffragists were left out of the telling of the story. It's time to correct the narrative & shine a light on those instrumental to this victory & the enduring fight for equality. https://t.co/aaTr87ySD6
Today marks the first day of the #DemConvention! There are only 78 days until the most important election of our lifetime.   Are you ready to make history? Watch along at https://t.co/TNtMXj8qzE.

Voters in SB County now will have 4 days to vote in person or can drop off ballots at dropboxes - starting 29 days before the election.  County clerk Joseph Holland: "The main message is to vote early...Avoid long lines. Vote safe vote at home.” https://t.co/lPbUdhaE1j

There's much concern about #USPS & the election A few things to know:   -GOP senators still blocking HEROES Act & $25b for USPS -Locally there will be ballot dropoff locations -Don't hold onto your ballot - fill it out and return it -In-person voting limited but still available https://t.co/OGsyCxfCPz

I'm ecstatic @JoeBiden chose @KamalaHarris as VP. I have always admired Harris' integrity character & dedication to serving our country. Harris has always fought for the middle class and working families - across California and right here on the Central Coast. #BidenHarris2020
On the 55th anniversary of the signing of the historic VRA it's once again time to strengthen the protections around our right to vote. Let's make every vote count. #VRA55 https://t.co/7hNxTZvuYl
Ventura County: https://t.co/3RaWw3qpAp
Santa Barbara County: https://t.co/Kf7WjE0L76
SLO County Clerk-Recorder:  https://t.co/sNRGIbofzd
Check with your county election dept to learn more about the candidates and initiatives on the ballot registration deadlines and lots more!
Visit https://t.co/zmB8A4lxQ5 to:  ✅ Register to vote  ✅ Pre-register to vote (16 - 17 yr olds) ✅ Check your registration status

🇺🇸100 days until Election Day!🇺🇸  Did you know that this year because of COVID-19 related safety measures ALL registered California voters will be mailed a vote-by-mail ballot?   It's true! Voting by mail is safe secure and you don't even need a stamp. 🗳️

Had a great talk with @JoeBiden and the @HispanicCaucus about issues facing the Latino community incl healthcare & immigration. With Trump's relentless attacks on Latino immigrants I'm glad to work with leaders like Joe who recognize that immigrants make our country stronger https://t.co/HJ23HyP3Fc
We're all in this together which is why today - and everyday - we stand in solidarity with our brothers and sisters. #StrikeForBlackLives https://t.co/k8ah12rOZe
En solidaridad...¡Si se puede! #StrikeForBlackLives https://t.co/nY8CULzn6z
Join in solidarity. July 20 #StrikeForBlackLives https://t.co/nY8CULzn6z

Losing two great civil rights revolutionaries so closely together weighs heavily on my heart. Rev. C.T. Vivian risked his life to fight racial discrimination and segregation and this country is better for it. Let's honor these heroes and never stop fighting for what's right. https://t.co/pqbLupRxEH

As we honor the life of the powerful @repjohnlewis so must we honor his legacy his fight and his hopefulness for what the United States can become. Never give up. #RestInPower  https://t.co/BwJKav73LN

While we're socially distanced to keep our communities safe I'm thinking about last year's Independence Day celebration with the Democratic Service Club of SBC and the @805YoungDems - two organizations that always inspire us to preserve our democracy through action. #4thofJuly https://t.co/wfB30nV1iI
On this important anniversary of the signing of the #CivilRightsAct let's make good on our commitment to ending discrimination and disenfranchisement. #blacklivesmatter https://t.co/7fy1hIUsCc

Many of you know that preventing gun violence is a deeply personal issue for me as it is for far too many communities across the nation and right here on the Central Coast. I am honored to have earned the endorsement of @Everytown and to be part of the #GunSenseMajority 🇺🇸 https://t.co/oZUBiCuBTq

In November we'll be voting for the future we want. But we all must be working now to solve the #climatecrisis I'm proud that this bipartisan committee has included two of my bills in its Climate Crisis Action Plan: Clean Water Infrastructure & Central Coast Heritage Protection https://t.co/FGsuctN1C2

Today's SCOTUS decision is a victory in preserving the right to choose but the fight is never over. I'm proud to have received the @PPact endorsement for re-election because this November it will take all of us to ensure that everyone has a right to healthcare. https://t.co/lfm5pkFhai

I'm honored to receive the endorsement of @Brady_PAC. There are too many communities and families impacted by gun violence - we must not wait for the next tragedy to demand better. https://t.co/r39wUV0VmB

Elections matter and this November our democracy is on the line. The American people deserve a leader ready to move us toward a just and equitable society. This is why I enthusiastically endorse @JoeBiden to be the next President of the United States.
Thank you for voting. Let’s keep this momentum up come November. #CA24

This election is pivotal—thank you to all who made your voices heard. I’m honored to serve #CA24 and stand up for our values. Based on results we’re seeing I’m proud it seems Central Coast residents want me to keep fighting for those values in Congress. https://t.co/rF0LyRcGPT
This is a campaign for all of us and I'm so proud of the coalition we've built and the values we're fighting for. Wondering who's endorsed me?   Check it out! https://t.co/PkzlCh7wtv

Today is the day #CA24! Make sure you get out and VOTE.   This election is pivotal and eyes are on California this #SuperTuesday. Don't sit this out. Polls are open 7 a.m.- 8 p.m. Vote your values and find your polling place below⬇️ https://t.co/A9nIQZ5nWT

TOMORROW is California Primary Election Day!   We have incredible candidates up and down the ballot and it's crucial that every voter in #CA24 make their voice heard. Polls are open 7 a.m.- 8 p.m. Find your polling place here: https://t.co/A9nIQZ5nWT

Election Day is March 3 and we’re knocking doors and talking to voters in Santa Barbara today. With the support of dedicated volunteers and community members we’re doing all we can to get out the vote! #TeamCarbajal #CA24 #GOTV https://t.co/BTkIFzIC9D
Glad to have been a part of this event with @JoanHartmann3D and @SMoniqueLimon in Guadalupe a few weeks back! We will always fight for Central Coast families. https://t.co/33QyANISum

I think our #CA24 values are this: We stand together and stand up for one another; we work hard to create opportunity support our families and protect our environment; we are passionate dedicated and optimistic about the future.  My candidate statement⬇️ https://t.co/M6nqM5xJmw
@SBIndyNews Election Day is March 3 but early voting and vote-by-mail are already underway. Be sure to make your voice heard!

This is an easy choice...Carbajal a former county supervisor has never been about ideology so much as he’s focused on constituent service. In that regard he’s delivered big time.   Proud to be endorsed by @SBIndyNews! https://t.co/TskUhKSKf3
Join @SLODemocrats TONIGHT to watch the debate enjoy some pizza and help elect local Democrats!  Details below⬇️ https://t.co/ajsQQzEuXH

Great time kicking off another canvass this weekend with  @ellenberaud!  We have strong candidates up and down the ballot and strong community members all across #CA24 who are leading the charge to make sure everyone gets out to vote!   Have you early voted yet? https://t.co/jZvEB2pRuN
TODAY! Join me @ellenberaud and community members as we get out the vote. See you there #CA24! https://t.co/1wjcLy7CWk

Will @ellenberaud and I see you TOMORROW at our canvassing event?   ➡️2/22 9:30 a.m. ➡️14080 San Antonio Rd Atascadero ➡️#GOTV   Election season is here and we have to do all we can to galvanize voters knock doors and talk to our neighbors about the issues that matter most. https://t.co/3x1PcSdonk
ATASCADERO: Join us this Saturday Feb 22 at 9:30 a.m. to knock doors and #GetOutTheVote!  🗳Hope to see you there! https://t.co/3x1PcSuZeS

It was an action-packed weekend for #TeamCarbajal! We knocked doors to get out the vote in Lompoc. Then @JoanHartmann3D @AsmMoniqueLimon and I held a rally in Guadalupe to talk to community members about how we’ll keep fighting for #CA24 families.  We’re in this together. https://t.co/u1GKmms3jk
Another successful Santa Barbara canvass with @smwlocal104 @SEIU721 and our energetic volunteers. We're knocking doors all over #CA24 so be on the lookout (and come join us)! https://t.co/mmFdmOQzqs

Had a great time speaking with @UCSBdems this evening. We talked about public service what’s happening in Congress and how we can win big for Democrats up and down the ballot in 2020! https://t.co/1NNWfvxi2p
